Values.METERINGPOINT_QUEUE_TOPIC_NAME: <Name of Service Bus queue for receiving business requests and internal commands>
Values.METERINGPOINT_QUEUE_CONNECTION_STRING: <Service Bus connection string where business requests and internal commands are received>
Values.INTEGRATION_EVENT_QUEUE: <Name of Service Bus queue for receiving integration/notification events>
Values.INTEGRATION_EVENT_QUEUE_CONNECTION: <Service Bus connection string where integration/notification events are received>
